titleStmt.title: The mirrour of friendship both hovv to knovve a perfect friend, and how to choose him. With a briefe treatise, or caueat, not to trust in worldly properitie. Translated out of Italian into English by Thomas Breme Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Breme, Thomas.
I. B., fl. 1584.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Abel Ieffes [and William Dickenson], dwelling in Sermon lane, neere Paules chayne,
